Message.Title: TWO MORE MESSAGE BOARD SUGGESTIONS
Message.Msg: 1) Eliminate political posts! If necessary, have a separate board just for politics. But get them off these finance boards. Companies like GE have 90% + posts about politics that have nothing to do with the company. One possibility - appoint volunteer monitors for groups of boards who will be trained and then given the authority to police thesel boards and delete non-relevant posts. 2) Take real action against the serial message board spammers who are stealing from Yahoo advertisers and users. Stopping click on URL's is a start but they are still posting using copy-paste. Track them down; stop issuing them ID's; close down their URL's; if, as I suspect, many are non-US, report them to their governments - but get rid of them. Just my opinion.
